code.title: getTilt.zip
code.description: Analyze coordinates of 3 tracker points on rat's head to determine if head is tilted or flat. Return boolean operator indicating if tilted.

code.title: smsig.m
code.description: Function to smooth a signal with Gaussian windowing algorithm, given the signal and the window size.

code.title: getfiles.zip
code.description: Obtain list of files and subdirectories given a directory.

code.title: deleteFileList.m
code.description: Remove all files in list. Same list obtained via getfiles().

code.title: howToFilter.m
code.description: Filtering signals in Matlab with the Butterworth filter.

code.title: tictactoe.py
code.description: Simple 2 player TicTacToe game in Python 3.

code.title: egcd.py
code.description: Extended Euclidean algorithm. Finds GCD of two numbers and Bezout's coefficients. Python 2.

code.title: QuickCode.zip
code.description: Rapid text encoder / decoder. Uses simple Caeser cypher with key for offset.

code.title: Coder.zip
code.description: Text encoder / decoder. Again, uses simple Caeser cypher with key for offset.

code.title: RWFile.zip
code.description: Easily read and write text files.

code.title: Translator.zip
code.description: Read in text file containing string of nucleotides and translate to corresponding amino-acid string.
